name: reMatch
description: Uses a regular expression (RE) to search a string for a pattern, starting from a specified position.

params.name: reg_expression
params.description: Regular expression for which to search. Case sensitive.

params.name: string
params.description: A string or a variable that contains one. String in which to search.

links.title: Learning ReMatch by Ben Nadel
links.description: Tutorial style article on using the reMatch function in CFML.

examples.title: Simple reMatch Example
examples.description: Extracts numbers from a string and returns them as an array
examples.code: serializeJSON( reMatch("[0-9]+", "1 way to extract any number like 45, 38") )
